 setCharSet ($param_lang='')

Function Documentation

setCharSet ( $  param_lang = ''  ) 

setCharSet returns the meta code to set the charset of the page based on the language variable $lang. param $param_lang = the language currently used by the script global $lang = in case the parameter is not used return = the meta code with the appropriate charset
